problem.markdown:
The following chart indicates the maximum number of connecting line segments y that can be drawn connecting x points, where no three points lie on the same line.

>>(a)<< >>The relationship between x and y is represented by the equation y=kx(x-1) for any positive number of points x . Use the information in the table to determine the value of the real number k (Answer in decimal form) << = 0.5 >>(b)<< >>Use the equation from part (a) to determine the maximum number of line segments that can be drawn connecting 100 points, no three of which lie on the same line.<< =4950
